WorkItem.Description:
When I try to run my WebMethod which makes HtmlAgilityPack calls i get following exception: 
 
System.Security.SecurityException: That assembly does not allow partially trusted callers.
 
On my local machine it works fine, I get that exception when I test my WebMethod on shared hosting provider machine. 
I don't know if this is bug and I guess it's common for many shared web hosting providers to run in this level of securtiy.
WorkItem.Summary: Can't use HtmlAgilityParser in partially trusted environment ?

Comments.Message:
Fixed!

I just add AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute in HtmlAgilityPack AssembyInfo
